      • await

        public ThreadActivity.Counts await(long millis)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Waits at most millis milliseconds for threads to terminate. A timeout of 0 means to wait forever.*

        Calls IGreenThrFactory.await(long) for each factory.

        Parameters:
        millis - maximum total time to wait in milliseconds
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread has interrupted the current thread. or onEmptyShutdown() was not called

                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
